data.title: A Shot Of Love Films
data.meta_description: Explore A Shot Of Love Films through big, beautiful photos of their work. Prices start at $3,500. Get details you'll only find on Zola, like full wedding and package pricing.
data.text:
A Shot Of Love Films creates unique wedding films based on personality in order to tell a couple's authentic love story. They are emotional, story driven wedding films for vibrant, fun loving couples who want to relive the story of their wedding day.

Our philosophy revolves around crafting films that celebrate the unique personalities of each couple. With a focus on creating wedding films that are as badass, fun-loving, and easy-going as the couples themselves, we strive to showcase the authentic moments, heartfelt emotions, and joyful connections that make each wedding day truly special. By infusing our work with a sense of adventure, spontaneity, and genuine laughter, we aim to attract couples who embrace life with a zest for creating unforgettable memories and leaving couples with a cinematic experience that perfectly encapsulates the essence of the couple's remarkable love story.

Book Caitlin for your wedding videos!

•Verified review

•Joy H.•Jun 7, 2024

We weren't sure if a videographer would've been overkill for our small wedding, but finding Caitlin and A Shot of Love Films changed everything. From our first conversation, Caitlin was incredibly responsive and understood our vision perfectly. She captured every detail, especially our live music, which was so important to us. Caitlin's talent is undeniable, and the final film is a beautiful, emotional keepsake of our best day. The final films exceeded our wildest expectations. It's a true work of art that beautifully encapsulates the joy and intimacy of our wedding day. We are beyond thrilled with our decision to have A Shot of Love Films document our special day and cannot recommend them highly enough to anyone seeking a talented and passionate videographer.

Amazing Experience

•Verified review

•Jessica•Dec 27, 2023

We had such an amazing experience with A Shot of Love Films. They were very professional and it was an amazing experience! Our engagement pictures and video captured the magic of the moment flawlessly. The team's professionalism, creativity, and attention to detail exceeded our expectations. Grateful for the beautiful memories they created for us. Highly recommend!

We felt like movie stars!

•Verified review

•Miles & R.•Dec 19, 2023

Caitlin and the team did an unbelievable job on our engagement video. The shoot itself was a really fun experience, with the videographer making us feel extra comfortable and fading into the background when needed. And then the final product... blew us away. Amazing cinematography and editing, A Shot of Love Films made us feel like movie stars. Highly recommended for any of their services!
